name: Apple
description: A juicy red fruit with a sweet and crunchy texture, rich in antioxidants and fiber.

name: Banana
description: A yellow curved fruit with a soft and creamy texture, rich in potassium and vitamins.

name: Mango
description: A yellow fibrous fruit with a sweet and tangy taste, rich in vitamins A and C.

name: Mulberry
description: A sweet and juicy fruit with a dark purple color, rich in antioxidants and fiber.

name: Kiwi
description: A small and furry fruit with a sweet and tangy taste, rich in vitamin C and potassium.

name: Cherry
description: A small and round fruit with a sweet and tart taste, rich in antioxidants and fiber.

name: Grapes
description: A small and round fruit with a sweet and juicy taste, rich in antioxidants and fiber.

name: Guava
description: A tropical fruit with a sweet and tangy taste, rich in vitamin C and fiber.

name: JackFruit
description: A large and green fruit with a sweet and slightly tangy taste, rich in vitamins and minerals.

name: Lemon
description: A sour and citrusy fruit with a high concentration of vitamin C, often used in cooking and cleaning.

name: Orange
description: A juicy and sweet fruit with a high concentration of vitamin C, often eaten fresh or juiced.

name: Pineapple
description: A tropical fruit with a sweet and tangy taste, rich in vitamin C and manganese.

name: Peach
description: A sweet and juicy fruit with a soft and fuzzy skin, rich in vitamins and minerals.

name: Pear
description: A sweet and buttery fruit with a soft and smooth skin, rich in fiber and vitamins.
